TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FeatureGateAttribute extends Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Filters.ActionFilterAttribute

Docs.summary: An attribute that can be placed on MVC actions to require all or any of a set of features to be enabled. If none of the feature are enabled the registered will be invoked.

Docs.summary: Creates an attribute that will gate actions unless all the provided feature(s) are enabled.

Docs.param: The context of the MVC action.
Docs.summary: Performs controller action pre-procesing to ensure that at least one of the specified features are enabled.
Docs.returns: Returns a task representing the action execution unit of work.
